quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The road to success is always under construction.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Education is the passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.text: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.text: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Leadership is not about a title or a designation. It's about impact, influence, and inspiration.
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.text: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.text: Before you are a leader, success is all about growing yourself. When you become a leader, success is all about growing others.
quotes.author: Jack Welch

quotes.text: The challenge of leadership is to be strong, but not rude; be kind, but not weak; be bold, but not a bully; be thoughtful, but not lazy; be humble, but not timid; be proud, but not arrogant; have humor, but without folly.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
quotes.author: Peter McIntyre

quotes.text: With confidence, you have won before you have started.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
quotes.author: Marcus Garvey

quotes.text: The most beautiful thing you can wear is confidence.
quotes.author: Blake Lively

quotes.text: Don't wait until everything is perfect. It will never be perfect. There will always be challenges, obstacles and less than perfect conditions. So what? Get started now.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.text: Grow through what you go through.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Strive for progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only way to grow is to challenge yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Growth is painful but worth it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success follows consistent effort.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.text: Friendship isn’t about whom you’ve known the longest — it’s about who walked into your life and said, 'I’m here for you.'
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.text: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson Gentry

quotes.text: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.text: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.text: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: There is no substitute for hard work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Dreams don’t work unless you do.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: Without hard work and discipline, it is difficult to be a top performer.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it’s bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: Programs must be written for people to read, and only incidentally for machines to execute.
quotes.author: Harold Abelson

quotes.text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds

quotes.text: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
quotes.author: Martin Fowler

quotes.text: The only way to learn a new programming language is by writing programs in it.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.text: Debugging is twice as hard as writing the code in the first place. Therefore, if you write the code as cleverly as possible, you are, by definition, not smart enough to debug it.
quotes.author: Brian Kernighan

quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: You can’t use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: The creative adult is the child who survived.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.text: Creativity is just connecting things. When you ask creative people how they did something, they feel a little guilty because they didn't really do it, they just saw something.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Every artist was first an amateur.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious, and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't try to do things. You just must do things.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury
